mapper.insert: insert into border_mst values( #{url}, #{id}, #{main_title}, #{main_tags}, #{main_content}, #{preview_img_url}, #{preview_txt}, now(), now() );
mapper.select: select bm.url, bm.id, bm.main_title, um.username, um.comment, bm.main_content, bm.preview_img_url, um.profile_img_url, bm.preview_txt, bm.create_date from border_mst bm left outer join user_mst um on(um.id = bm.id) where url = #{url};

select bm.url, bm.main_title, bm.main_content, bm.main_tags, bm.id, um.username, um.profile_img_url, bm.preview_img_url, bm.preview_txt, bm.create_date from border_mst bm inner join user_mst um on(um.id = bm.id) where um.username = #{username} order by bm.update_date desc;

select bm.url, bm.id, um.username, bm.main_title, bm.preview_img_url, um.profile_img_url, bm.preview_txt, bm.update_date from border_mst bm left outer join user_mst um on(um.id = bm.id) order by update_date desc;
